author: billbarker
msg: Final level in replacing CertificatesValve under Coyote.
This is a little hackish, but is portable to 4.x without changing the API.  Here, it should probably change once Coyote is properly exposed to Catalina.
If there aren't any major complaints, I'll port to the 4.1 branch later.

author: billbarker
msg: Duplicate the certificate attribute from Coyote, until we can use it for all versions.
